confirmRecent.description: If you have not left the event scene, we can fill in the location data.

emergency.description: If the event was notified to the authorities and you have an official document, please upload it here

statementFirstScreen.description: Are you at the event scene and close to the time the event occurred? eClaims Solution will guide you through the process to fill your data
statementFirstScreen.modalDescription: You have 24 hours from the time of the accident to fill an accident statement or to present yourself at the nearest police station
materialDamages.title: Are there other material losses?
materialDamages.choice1: To other vehicles besides A and B (even parked ones)
materialDamages.choice2: To other objects besides vehicles A and B (such as parapets, curbs, circulation signs etc)
police.title: Go to the police station
police.description: In case there are more than 2 participants involved in the accident, a police report is required
police.comeBack: Please come back when you have it.
statementSelectTime.exceeded24: You cannot complete an accident statement form if more than 24 hours have passed from the accident.
injury.title: Are there personal injuries?
injury.description: It applies to any type of personal injury even if it is a minor one.
damageStatementImgInstructions.Sasiu: A photo with the VIN number punched on the body of the vehicle (do NOT photograph labels), taken close up.
damageStatementImgInstructions.Kilometra: A photo taken with the ignition on, close up with the on-board light on, to capture the number of kilometers recorded on board the vehicle.
damageStatementImgInstructions.Fata: A frontal photo, taken with the engine compartment hood closed. In the center of the photo must be the manufacturer's logo, so that both the upper frame of the windshield and the entire front bumper are attached to the lens.
damageStatementImgInstructions.Spate: A photo from the back of the car, taken with the boot lid closed. In the center of the photo must be the back plate with the registration number, so that both the upper frame of the rear sight and the entire rear bumper are caught in the lens.
damageStatementImgInstructions.Dreapta: A photo on the right side, with the central pillar (B) placed in the center of the photo, so that the entire side of the car is framed in the photo.
damageStatementImgInstructions.Stanga: A photo on the left side, with the central pillar (B) placed in the center of the photo, so that the entire side of the car is framed in the photo.
damageStatementImgInstructions.Ansamblu: A close-up photo that captures the entire damaged area of ​​the first item that needs repair / replacement
damageStatementObservations.title: Description of the event
damageStatementObservations.instructions: We need a short description of the event.
damageStatementSurroundings.otherModalTi: Briefly describe the type of event

ibanData.note: * To be filled only if the account holder is not one and the same person as the injured person.
